message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.DS 

This paper discusses a proactive security framework for monitoring attacks in large scale cloud networks. It uses Moving Target Defense (MTD) and Markov Game modeling to identify and reason about multi-stage attacks. The paper focuses on the security aspect of the cloud network, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The use of AI and game theory in the framework suggests that it could also be categorized under cs.AI and cs.SY. The network aspect of the framework could also place it under cs.NI. Finally, the use of Markov Game modeling suggests that it could be categorized under cs.DS as well.
